_header: I will be mended if I say miss
_description: ‘Of the sacrament of the Altere’ — sixteen 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
I wole be mendid ȝif y say mysholychirche nes noþer tre
                    ne stones…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…In stede of þat oure soules to gladeWe resceyue oure
                    housell god o blisse
BodDig102.Attributed Title: Of the sacrament of the Altere (f. 123v)
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 103-7.
